tha-ap458:0.3_0: Hearing a jungle thicket and a senior by senior monks.
tha-ap458:1.2_0: the world, for the world of the gods,
tha-ap458:1.3_0: You sleep at a forest grove
tha-ap458:2.3_0: I’m not aware of any bad places
tha-ap458:3.1_0: My defilements have been burnt away by practicing absorption—
tha-ap458:5.1_0: Attaining the four kinds of textual analysis
tha-ap458:6.1_0: That is how these verses were recited by the senior venerable Kaṇḍiya.
tha-ap458:7.1_0: sixth round about the senior monks.
